<script>
// Video control functionality
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const video = document.getElementById('heroVideo');
    const toggleBtn = document.getElementById('videoToggle');
    const overlay = document.getElementById('videoOverlay');

    if (video && toggleBtn) {
        toggleBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
            if (video.paused) {
                video.play();
                toggleBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-pause"></i>';
                toggleBtn.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Pause video');
            } else {
                video.pause();
                toggleBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-play"></i>';
                toggleBtn.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Play video');
                // Darken overlay when paused for better text readability
                if (overlay) {
                    overlay.style.background = 'linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(168, 216, 255, 0.6) 0%, rgba(245, 233, 220, 0.5) 50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) 100%)';
                }
            }
        });

        // Reset overlay when video plays
        video.addEventListener('play', function() {
            if (overlay) {
                overlay.style.background = 'linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(168, 216, 255, 0.4) 0%, rgba(245, 233, 220, 0.3) 50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 100%)';
            }
        });
    }

    // Animated counters for stats
    function animateCounter(element) {
        const target = parseInt(element.getAttribute('data-target'));
        const duration = 2000; // 2 seconds
        const start = 0;
        const increment = target / (duration / 16); // 60fps
        let current = start;

        const updateCounter = () => {
            current += increment;
            if (current < target) {
                element.textContent = Math.floor(current);
                requestAnimationFrame(updateCounter);
            } else {
                element.textContent = target;
            }
        };

        updateCounter();
    }

    // Intersection Observer for triggering animations when stats come into view
    const statNumbers = document.querySelectorAll('.stat-number');
    if (statNumbers.length > 0) {
        const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
            entries.forEach(entry => {
                if (entry.isIntersecting && entry.target.textContent === '0') {
                    animateCounter(entry.target);
                }
            });
        }, { threshold: 0.5 });

        statNumbers.forEach(stat => observer.observe(stat));
    }

    // Scroll animations
    const observeElements = (elements) => {
        const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
            entries.forEach(entry => {
                if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                    entry.target.classList.add('visible');
                }
            });
        }, {
            threshold: 0.1,
            rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
        });

        elements.forEach(element => observer.observe(element));
    };

    // Apply scroll animations to different element types
    const fadeElements = document.querySelectorAll('.fade-in');
    const slideLeftElements = document.querySelectorAll('.slide-in-left');
    const slideRightElements = document.querySelectorAll('.slide-in-right');

    if (fadeElements.length > 0) observeElements(fadeElements);
    if (slideLeftElements.length > 0) observeElements(slideLeftElements);
    if (slideRightElements.length > 0) observeElements(slideRightElements);

    // Newsletter form enhancement
    const newsletterForm = document.querySelector('.newsletter-form');
    if (newsletterForm) {
        newsletterForm.addEventListener('submit', function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            const email = this.querySelector('.newsletter-email').value;
            const button = this.querySelector('.newsletter-btn');

            if (email) {
                // Simulate signup process
                button.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-check"></i> Thank You!';
                button.style.background = '#28a745';

                setTimeout(() => {
                    button.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-paper-plane"></i> Join Us';
                    button.style.background = '';
                    this.reset();
                }, 3000);
            }
        });
    }
});
</script>
